alert.note: Alert for Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 23 at 1:50AM MDT until June 25 at 9:41AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River At La Junta affecting Otero County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Pueblo, Avondale, Nepesta, Fowler, Rocky Ford, La Junta, Lamar...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River At La Junta. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Moderate Flood. Local residential flooding is possible in La Junta. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 AM MDT Friday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 13.3 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.4 feet on 06/12/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 200 PM MDT.
